name: account_updated
definition: The event is emitted anytime an account is updated by an end user or API request.
trigger: Triggered anytime an existing account is updated.

schema.name: The name of the account.
schema.account_id: The Canvas id of the account.
schema.root_account_id: The id of the Canvas root account the created account belongs to.
schema.root_account_uuid: The uuid of the Canvas root account the created account belongs to.
schema.parent_account_id: The id of the Canvas parent account of the created account.
schema.external_status: The external status of the account.
schema.workflow_state: The workflow state of the account.
schema.domain: The Canvas domain of the root account of the account.
schema.default_time_zone: The default time zone of the account.
schema.default_locale: The default locale of the account.

metadata.user_agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_14_3) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/73.0.3683.103 Safari/537.36
